page.title: 11SHOPPING
page.content: Although there are two shops in the locality these do not carry a big enough range of goods to satisfy peoples needs. One shop is a Post Office & general store, the other a newsagents & and general store. Most people, therefore, leave the villages to do their main shopping many people go to Coleshill,Chelmsley Wood, Tamworth or other nearby shopping centres, whilst a big percentage make use of the Hypermarket at Minworth. For clothes & larger consumer goods, Birmingham is used by about 80% of the people, some also use the smaller shopping centres & one or two use Coventry. 39% of the people surveyed use Catalogue Shopping as a convenient mean of buying clothes.
